metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28012 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Exim 4 before 4.94.2 allows Exposure of File Descriptor to UnintendedControl Sphere because rda_interpret uses a privileged pipe that lacks aclose-on-exec flag.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28012` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
exim4-base - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
exim4-config - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
exim4-daemon-light - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
eximon4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exim4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.90.1-1ubuntu1.8').
